thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Hotel Eiffel Cambronne - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: They should strip a star from this hotel
thread.title_full: They should strip a star from this hotel - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Eiffel Cambronne, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Be W
title: They should strip a star from this hotel
text:
Bad experience, since the get go, rude personnel, old and incredibly small lift, the room was small and moldy, paper thin walls, I could hear snoring of the contiguous room, not to mention that the neon sign was just outside the window. I tried to turn the AC on and a really bad smell filled the room, and it didn't even cooled the room, had to keep a window open which was an annoyance due to the sign just outside, street noise and didn't feel safe. Commodities are non-existent and very uncomfortable bed and pillows. Wouldn't stay here again. The only silver lining is that is close to the Eiffel Tower and attractions. They should strip at least 1 star from this hotel!
Room Tip: Ask for a room in the upper rooms See more room tips
